thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN PREMIER Trocadero La Tour - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice little hotel
thread.title_full: Nice little hotel - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Trocadero La Tour, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Hanna E
title: Nice little hotel
text: We spent three days in Paris before returning home. Hotel is within reasonable walking distance from Eiffel tower and several baton stops. Area is nice, some shopping and restaurants next door. Pretty small room, as they tend to be in Paris. Elevator is super small, had to make several trips with luggage.
